response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item carries a special value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a price of $750,000, believing it to be an opportunity for both parties to benefit from its unparalleled quality and potential impact. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction with excellent customer service to ensure your satisfaction. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 750000}
